appDisplayName: OPC Server for W&T Network Devices
description:
Access W&T network devices via OPC (OPC DA, OPC A&E)

Many visualization systems for building and automation technology can
exchange data using the OPC standard. This OPC server permits convenient 
incorporation of Web-Thermometers, Web-IOs and Com-Servers into such 
systems.
